PluginArray.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The PluginArray interface is used to store a list of objects; it's returned by the property. The PluginArray is not a JavaScript array, but has the length property and supports accessing individual items using bracket notation (plugins[2]), as well as via item(index) and namedItem("name") methods.

blockquote.para: Own properties of PluginArray objects are no longer enumerable in the latest browser versions.
